name: Bad Oil
description:
Overview

An oil company has moved into your desert and you want to get them out!

Goal

Blow up all of the oil containers and steal the companies chest of profits!

Gameplay

First you must wait until it is nighttime before you start your attack. If you run out of ammo or start too many fires on the environment, you lose! Use the elevator to get inside the facility where they hold the money after blowing up all of the oil containers.
